div.label: Partial payment USD 500.— for advisor procedure
USD 12,500.-- at the beginning; USD 12,500. -- after 12 months
USD 9,000.-- at the beginning; 9,000.-- after 12 months, 8,000.-- after Phase1

div.div: The listed tuition fee includes all digital learning materials, including software and user data for the online portals, as well as exam fees for the first entrance to each module. For each further examination in a subject due to non-existence of the first entrance, a fee of USD 100, - will be due. The activation of the learning documents will only take place after the payment of the tuition fee.

div.p:
I have read the terms and conditions with today's date including resignation of the Global Humanistic University, I agree with these and accept with my submission that these are the basis for my study contract.
With my submission, I also confirm the accuracy of my information.
